初遇.encontent:
Hi hi, I'm here. I'm aliEn T, a peace-loving visitor
 from outer space.
初遇.content:
嗨，嗨，我在这里。我是星之眼，一名热爱和平的域外访
客。

箱中气候.encontent:
Increasing humidity and decreasing visibility detected.
  My friend, what's happening? You have to tell me
 about this please.
箱中气候.content:
检测到周围湿度上升，能见度下降。我的朋友，这是发生
了什么事情？请一定要告诉我。

致未来.encontent:
I don't think you should worry about the future, as
 long as our plan is going to work ...
致未来.content:
我不认为你们需要担心未来的事儿，如果我们的计划能实
现的话……

孑立.encontent:
WHEN! DO! YOU! GET! ME! BACK!  I'm so done with it, and I'm telling
 you, you blue jelly feather birdy tail,  screw your nebula office
 process ... I'M DONE WITH IT!
孑立.content:
你们！到底！什么时候！才会来接我回去？！我受够了，我
再告诉你一次你这个蓝果冻羽毛鸟尾巴。去你的星云办公
流程——我已经受！够！了！！

朝晨.encontent:
Another morning, and the night follows it. That's the
 reason why trees and grass grow. Said to me a lady
 in a gown.
朝晨.content:
又是一个清晨，与夜交替。植物因此而生长，这是一位穿
长裙的小姐告诉我的。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Today you are 27 minutes and 35 seconds later than
 usual.  Oh it's okay my dear friend, you do need more
 sleep.
信任-朝晨.content:
今天的你比平日晚起了27分钟35秒。噢，没关系的，我
亲爱的朋友，你的确需要更多休息。

夜暮.encontent:
It's detected that, people at this time of the day are having
 their most intense emotional fluctuations.  Thus it's extremely
 difficult to verify the authenticity of their statements.
夜暮.content:
经检测，这一时间段的人们正处于情感波动最剧烈的阶段
。发言真实性的判断难度极高。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
The data I've collected shows that some people will turn into
 werewolves because of the full moon ... What do you mean "they
 are into flying objects"  ... a flying object, like me?!
信任-夜暮.content:
因为“月圆”而成为狼人，这是我曾收集过的数据……你
所说的“他们喜欢飞盘”又是什么意思？……飞盘，就像
我这种？！

帽檐与发鬓.encontent: Metal, plastic, or other materials, it doesn't matter.
帽檐与发鬓.content: 金属，塑料，还是其他的物质，这都不重要。

袖与手.encontent:
Cow ... Cow?! What cow?! This is not a cow ...  My dear friend,
 this is ... this is the DUU-DUU-BELL-BOO that lives on the back
 side of the atmosphere! That's ... Yes, that's what it's called!
袖与手.content:
奶牛？！什么奶牛？！这不是奶牛——我、我亲爱的朋友
，这是……这是生长在大气层后侧的DUU-DUU-BELL-BOO！对
，这是它的名字。

衣着与身形.encontent:
... Fresh and healthy, right? I regularly provide it
 energy, and that's the only entertainment I have.
 Grow some grass! Be a gardener! ... Egh.
衣着与身形.content:
……新鲜又健康，对吧？我给了它定期的能量供给，这是
我能做的唯一娱乐了。养点草！像个园丁！——呃。

嗜好.encontent:
If you have any clue about dispelling the effect of
 the "shrink and imprison" incantation, please tell
 me ... No, not for me, I have a friend who ...
嗜好.content:
如果你有任何关于“解除缩小禁锢”的咒语，都可以分享
给我……不，不是我，是我的一个朋友他……

赞赏.encontent: Being such an erudite, do you also have some missions?
赞赏.content: 你的知识储量这样丰富，难道你也有相关的任务在身吗？

亲昵.encontent:
May I come with you next time you go out? I just ...
 want to hang out.
亲昵.content:
下次出行的时候能让我一同前往吗？——我只是想，出去
走走。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
What Susie said to her husband was the opposite to the reality.
  It is called lying, a skill that mastered by many creatures.
  It is troublesome, yet convenient.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
最新的电视剧里，苏西对她的丈夫说了谎。这是谎言，一
种生物们所熟练的技能。它很麻烦，也很便捷。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
... Arcanist, the biggest variate in my investigation and observation.
 We never knew your existence. You are huge ...  New friends,
 brand new friends to us.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
……神秘学家，我调查与观测途中最大的变数。我们从不
知道你们的存在。你们对我们来说是巨大的————新朋
友、全新的朋友。

独白.encontent:
... These emotional words, I shouldn't have told anybody. But
 I have family, I miss them too. How long haven't I seen them?
 T-9910.2 and C-00138,I can barely remember the color of their
 outboard window's coating.
独白.content:
……这些感性的糟心话，我不该对任何人说的。可我也有
家人，我也想念他们，我有多久没能见过他们了？T-9910.2和
C-00138，我都快记不起他们外舷视窗镀膜的颜色
了。

入队.encontent: Who knew an investigator will need to do such a thing.
入队.content: 资料采集员居然需要做到如此地步。

释放神秘术Ⅱ.content: 你这个傻瓜！蠢货！臭袜子！

召唤至终的仪式.encontent: My friend! Dance together with DUU-DUU-BELL-BOO!

战斗胜利.encontent:
That's a lot of data. I have full confidence in the
 future.
战斗胜利.content: 丰富的数据采集，我对未来充满信心。

洞悉.encontent:
Thank you so much, my dear human friend. Thinking about
 the future, I'm really sorry.
洞悉.content:
十分感谢你，我亲爱的人类朋友。想到以后的事情，我真
是感到不舍。
